ANDS-Grants.description: Although people with intellectual and developmental disabilities (PwIDD) now have vastly improved life expectancy, there is limited information on how to integrate and transfer knowledge between the aged care and disability sectors for this vulnerable population. In partnership with disability and aged-care agencies across NSW and Queensland, this study will develop and validate a best practice framework to inform both sectors on how they can better meet the needs of PwIDD, within the context of disparate Commonwealth and State government policies. The study will also examine health and social care disparities between PwIDD who are ageing and their age peers without lifelong disabilities across urban and rural locations in two states.
ANDS-Grants.title: Linkage Projects - Grant ID: LP130100168
